text.tspan: Fine-grained network policy [micro-segmentation](PAN, NSX, Aviatrix, CNI in K8s)
Mesh: authz: Service 1 allowed to call Service 2
Mesh: expose Service 2 for cross-cluster consumption
Mesh: Route: transit gateway: 15543 -> transit gateway: 15443
u-segment: allow app1 to transit gateway
u-segment: allow transit gateway to app2
